pages.text: A $(item)Decorated Pot$() is a storage block crafted from $(item)Bricks$() and/or $(l:rare/pottery:sherds)$(item)Pottery Sherds$(), with the items used individually affecting the appearance of its four side faces. $(br2)It can store a single inventory slot's worth of items, which cannot be seen or retrieved by hand without breaking the pot.

The pot's sides correspond to the item used in the crafting. $(br2)If a $(l:rare/pottery_sherds)$(item)Pottery Sherd$() is used, that side bears the texture of that sherd, if a $(item)Brick$() is used, that side bears the default texture.
